snippet.title: Monster Girl Invasion RPG Crowdfunding Trailer
snippet.description:
This is the original trailer used for the crowdfunding campaign that we ran for Monster Girl Invasion RPG.
It contains a lot of cool WIP shots of things that are much different now but is otherwise a fun first look at the game.
